## Current Research Projects

**Dissertation Research:** Computational analysis of online extremist networks and their translation to offline political violence

**COVID-19 Media Framing:** Investigating partisan differences in visual and textual pandemic coverage (with Andrew Q. Philips)

**Gaming & Extremism:** Multi-platform study of recruitment and radicalization in digital gaming environments

**Policy & Markets:** Analysis of how political messaging affects financial market responses (under review)
